sentences.english: They sandbagged their homes to keep out floods.
sentences.chinese: 他們在房屋周圍墊上沙袋以抵禦水災。

sentences.english: Completing the war motif, sandbags surround the outdoor seating area.
sentences.chinese: 爲了凸顯戰爭主題，店外客座區周圍都堆滿了沙袋。

sentences.english: That fitted with a small sandbag 2.
sentences.chinese: 小的那隻裝上兩片沙袋。

sentences.english: Residents and authorities had been pinning their hopes on sandbagging.
sentences.chinese: 市民和當局都將他們的希望寄託在沙袋上。

sentences.english: Bullets ripped into the sandbags of the guard tower, kicking up puffs of sand.
sentences.chinese: 子彈撕開警衛塔下的沙袋，揚起串串沙塵。

sentences.english: Completing the war motif, sandbags surround the outdoor seating area.
sentences.chinese: 完全戰爭的主題，沙袋包環繞室外的座位區。

sentences.english: Carry the sandbag on the designated route.
sentences.chinese: 在指定的線路上搬運沙袋。

sentences.english: As you might think, I really would like a tiger at the end of the installation of sandbags 3.
sentences.chinese: 正如你所想的，我的確想在老虎的底裝上3片沙袋。

sentences.english: Villagers are scrambling to pile sandbags onto the top of the dyke to raise it higher.
sentences.chinese: 村民們正急匆匆地在壩頂堆積沙袋以加高堤壩。

sentences.english: I could have put toys in place of the sandbags and teddy bears instead of guns.
sentences.chinese: 我也可以把沙袋換成玩具，把槍支換成泰德熊。

sentences.english: As I was trying to recover from that, I tripped over a sandbag .
sentences.chinese: 正當我試着恢復過來的時候，我又跌倒在一個沙袋上。

sentences.english: Look at the rabbit doll and sandbags were evacuated, cui yuan in the mind very happy.
sentences.chinese: 看着那兔子玩偶和沙袋被運走了，崔元心裏很開心。

sentences.english: Some communities have built sand-bag walls to protect their homes.
sentences.chinese: 一些社區建立起沙袋牆保護他們的家園。

sentences.english: The Illinois Army National Guard is helping with sandbagging duties in Quincy.
sentences.chinese: 伊力諾依的國民警衛隊正在昆西地區用沙袋築起堤壩。

sentences.english: Residents and authorities had been pinning their hopes sandbagging.
sentences.chinese: 當地居民和政府正在縫製他們寄予希望的沙袋。

sentences.english: The residents sandbagged the beach front.
sentences.chinese: 居民堆沙袋加固海灘前沿。
